title: Possible bug in the loot tab.
body: You currently have an alert telling us about the skin tab bug, went into the loot tab unable to click on anything and wondered "Is this part of the skin tab bug?" But it's not as i found the skin tab missing as you had told us. Is this client side for me? or a client bug in general?

replies.body: Just unable to click or was it black? Sometimes the loot panel doesn't load properly and you have to go out and back into it. If you just couldn't click anything I'm not sure, I'd probs recommend trying a client repair if just restarting the client doesn't work, but it could also be an isolated bug.
